name: Your Angel // Your Devil
description:
It's the New Year! With it comes New Year's Resolutions. You've never been good at keeping with your resolutions, so you and your friends decide to meet up monthly to keep each other accountable.

Will you keep up with your resolutions? or will you fall to temptation?  Find out!

This game is a submission for #D2020Jam  hosted by @temporalhiccup
